::: {.question-block}

<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault();" style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px;">
    <label for="q3"><strong>What is the typical average annual return of the stock market (e.g., S&P 500) over long periods?</strong></label>
    <input type="number" id="q3" name="q3" placeholder="Enter a number" style="width: 100px;"
           data-correct-answer="10"    data-tolerance="1"          />
</form>

<div id="feedback-q3" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
    The typical average annual return of the S&P 500 over long periods is around 10% (historically, between 9% and 12% is often cited).
</div>

:::
